front.title: Use of IPsec for Securing DHCPv4 Messages Exchanged Between Relay Agents and Servers

abstract.t: 'DHCP Relay Agent Information Option' (RFC 3046) assumes that DHCPmessages exchanged between relay agents and servers are not subjectto attack. This document describes how IPsec can be used to protectmessages exchanged between relay agents and servers.
